aiMode.label: Default AI mode

aiMode.chatAiSettingsDescription: Configure AI for daily conversations and task suggestions.

researchModel.label: Research model
researchModel.description: Choose the AI model for 'Deep Research' functionality.
researchModel.researchDescription: Provides factual answers with citations and maximum depth.
researchModel.instructionDescription: Follows instructions precisely and is ideal for directed tasks.
researchModel.creativeDescription: Offers innovative ideas and original perspectives with enhanced creativity.
researchModel.perplexitySonarDescription: Uses Perplexity Sonar for in-depth answers with up-to-date web data and citations.
researchModel.gpt4oMiniDescription: Uses GPT-4o Mini for quick, reliable answers based on previous training.

chatModel.label: Chat model provider
chatModel.description: Choose which model is used for standard chat functionality.
chatModel.perplexitySonarDescription: Uses Perplexity Sonar for comprehensive and contextual responses.
chatModel.gpt4oMiniDescription: Uses GPT-4o Mini for efficient and balanced responses (default).

aiModelConfig.drawerDescription: Adjust settings for the AI models.
